languages.text: "Ты не имела права". {n}Проктор смотрит на бывшую соратницу тяжелым взглядом, предназначенным приговоренным.{/n} "Я верю тому, что ты видела, но ты не имела права. Никто в Просторе не смеет судить Вольных Торговцев. Ты поставила себя выше положений священного Патента, а значит — и выше Лекс Империалис!"

"You did not have that right." {n}The Proctor regards his former comrade with the heavy gaze he reserves for the condemned.{/n} "I believe that you saw what you say you saw, but you had no right to act the way you did. None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and in so doing, above the Lex Imperialis!"
languages.original_text: "Ты не имела права". {n}Проктор смотрит на бывшую соратницу тяжелым взглядом, предназначенным приговоренным.{/n} "Я верю тому, что ты видела, но ты не имела права. Никто в Просторе не смеет судить Вольных Торговцев. Ты поставила себя выше положений священного Патента, а значит — и выше Лекс Империалис!"

traits.locale_text: "You did not have that right." {n}The Proctor regards his former comrade with a heavy gaze reserved for those condemns.{/n} "I believe that you saw what you say you saw, but you had no right to act the way you did. None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and therefore, above the Lex Imperialis!"

None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and therefore, above the Lex Imperialis!"

None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and in so doing, above the Lex Imperialis!"

"You did not have that right." {n}The Proctor regards his former comrade with the heavy gaze he reserves for the condemned.{/n} "I believe that you saw what you say you saw, but you had no right to act the way you did. None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and in so doing, above the Lex Imperialis!"

"You did not have that right." {n}The Proctor regards his former comrade with the heavy gaze he reserves for the condemned.{/n} "I believe that you saw what you say you saw, but you had no right to act the way you did. None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and in so doing, above the Lex Imperialis!"

"You did not have that right." {n}The Proctor regards his former comrade with the heavy gaze he reserves for the condemned.{/n} "I believe that you saw what you say you saw, but you had no right to act the way you did. None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and in so doing, above the Lex Imperialis!"

languages.text: “你无权这么做。”{n}索罗蒙看着这位曾经的战友，目光沉重，仿佛看着死刑犯一样。{/n}“我相信你看到的一切都是真的，但你没有权力那么做。整个科罗努斯扩区没人有权评判行商浪人，你将自己的意志凌驾于神圣授状之上，也就等同于凌驾于帝国法典之上！”
languages.original_text: "You did not have that right." {n}The Proctor regards his former comrade with the heavy gaze he reserves for the condemned.{/n} "I believe that you saw what you say you saw, but you had no right to act the way you did. None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and in so doing, above the Lex Imperialis!"

traits.locale_text: “你无权这么做。”{n}索罗蒙看着这位曾经的战友，目光沉重，仿佛看着死刑犯一样。{/n}“我相信你看到的一切都是真的，但你没有权力那么做。整个科罗努斯扩区没人有权评判行商浪人，你将自己的意志凌驾于神圣授状之上，也就等同于凌驾于帝国法典之上！”

languages.text: «No tenía derecho a hacerlo». {n}El Procurador dedica a su antiguo camarada la misma mirada que reserva para los condenados.{/n} «Creo que vio lo que dice haber visto, pero no tenía derecho a actuar de esa forma. Nadie en toda la Extensión puede juzgar a los Comerciantes Independientes. Se ha impuesto a la sagrada Patente, y, al hacerlo, ¡a la Lex Imperialis!».
languages.original_text: "You did not have that right." {n}The Proctor regards his former comrade with the heavy gaze he reserves for the condemned.{/n} "I believe that you saw what you say you saw, but you had no right to act the way you did. None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and in so doing, above the Lex Imperialis!"

traits.locale_text: «No tenía derecho a hacerlo». {n}El Procurador dedica a su antiguo camarada la misma mirada que reserva para los condenados.{/n} «Creo que vio lo que dice haber visto, pero no tenía derecho a actuar de esa forma. Nadie en toda la Extensión puede juzgar a los Comerciantes Independientes. Se ha impuesto a la sagrada Patente, y, al hacerlo, ¡a la Lex Imperialis!».

languages.text: « Vous n'aviez pas le droit d'agir ainsi, » {n}déclare le proctor à son ancienne camarade, portant sur elle le regard sévère qu'il réserve d'ordinaire aux condamnés.{/n} « Je crois votre version des événements, mais vous n'aviez pas le droit d'agir ainsi. Personne dans les Étendues n'est en position de juger les libres marchands. Vous vous êtes placée au-dessus de la lettre de marque, et donc de la Lex Imperialis ! »
languages.original_text: "You did not have that right." {n}The Proctor regards his former comrade with the heavy gaze he reserves for the condemned.{/n} "I believe that you saw what you say you saw, but you had no right to act the way you did. None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and in so doing, above the Lex Imperialis!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'aviez pas le droit d'agir ainsi, » {n}déclare le proctor à son ancienne camarade, portant sur elle le regard sévère qu'il réserve d'ordinaire aux condamnés.{/n} « Je crois votre version des événements, mais vous n'aviez pas le droit d'agir ainsi. Personne dans les Étendues n'est en position de juger les libres marchands. Vous vous êtes placée au-dessus de la lettre de marque, et donc de la Lex Imperialis ! »

languages.text: 「お前にその権利はなかった」{n}代理人は、死刑囚に向けるような重い視線でかつての仲間を見つめた。{/n}「お前は自分が見たと言うものを見たのだろう。しかし、あのように行動する権利はなかった。エクスパンスの誰もローグトレーダーを裁くことはできない。お前は聖なる令状の文言を軽んじ、その結果、レックス・インペリアの上に自らを置いたのだ！」
languages.original_text: "You did not have that right." {n}The Proctor regards his former comrade with the heavy gaze he reserves for the condemned.{/n} "I believe that you saw what you say you saw, but you had no right to act the way you did. None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and in so doing, above the Lex Imperialis!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前にその権利はなかった」{n}代理人は、死刑囚に向けるような重い視線でかつての仲間を見つめた。{/n}「お前は自分が見たと言うものを見たのだろう。しかし、あのように行動する権利はなかった。エクスパンスの誰もローグトレーダーを裁くことはできない。お前は聖なる令状の文言を軽んじ、その結果、レックス・インペリアの上に自らを置いたのだ！」

languages.text: "Buna hakkın yoktu." {n}Üsteğmen, eski yoldaşını hükümlülere attığı ağır bakışlarla selamlıyor.{/n} "Gördüğünü söylediğin şeyi gördüğüne inanıyorum ama böyle bir davranışı sergilemeye hakkın yoktu. Enginlik'te hiç kimse Hür Tacirleri yargılayamaz. Kendini kutsal Ruhsatname'den üstün görüyorsun ve bunu yaparak Lex İmperialis'ten kendini üstün görmüş oluyorsun!"
languages.original_text: "You did not have that right." {n}The Proctor regards his former comrade with the heavy gaze he reserves for the condemned.{/n} "I believe that you saw what you say you saw, but you had no right to act the way you did. None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and in so doing, above the Lex Imperialis!"

traits.locale_text: "Buna hakkın yoktu." {n}Üsteğmen, eski yoldaşını hükümlülere attığı ağır bakışlarla selamlıyor.{/n} "Gördüğünü söylediğin şeyi gördüğüne inanıyorum ama böyle bir davranışı sergilemeye hakkın yoktu. Enginlik'te hiç kimse Hür Tacirleri yargılayamaz. Kendini kutsal Ruhsatname'den üstün görüyorsun ve bunu yaparak Lex Imperialis'ten kendini üstün görmüş oluyorsun!"

languages.text: "Ihr hattet nicht das Recht dazu." {n}Der Proktor wirft seinem früheren Kameraden einen schweren Blick zu, der für Verurteilte reserviert ist.{/n} "Ich glaube, dass Ihr gesehen habt, was Ihr sagt, aber Ihr hattet kein Recht, so zu handeln, wie Ihr es getan habt. Niemand in der Ausdehnung darf Freihändler verurteilen. Ihr habt Euch über die Worte des heiligen Handelsbriefs gestellt und damit über das Lex Imperia!"
languages.original_text: "You did not have that right." {n}The Proctor regards his former comrade with the heavy gaze he reserves for the condemned.{/n} "I believe that you saw what you say you saw, but you had no right to act the way you did. None in the Expanse may judge the Rogue Traders. You put yourself above the letter of the sacred Warrant, and in so doing, above the Lex Imperialis!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hattet nicht das Recht dazu." {n}Der Proktor wirft seinem früheren Kameraden einen schweren Blick zu, der für Verurteilte reserviert ist.{/n} "Ich glaube, dass Ihr gesehen habt, was Ihr sagt, aber Ihr hattet kein Recht, so zu handeln, wie Ihr es getan habt. Niemand in der Ausdehnung darf Freihändler verurteilen. Ihr habt Euch über die Worte des heiligen Handelsbriefs gestellt und damit über das Lex Imperia!"
